body:
SELECT   a/content[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.immunisation_list.v0]/items[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1]/description[at0017]/items[at0020]/value/value as medication_item
        FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c
  CONTAINS (ACTION a[openEHR-EHR-ACTION.medication.v1])
            LIMIT 1
        ORDER BY c /context/start_time/ value DESC
